description: The first applicant today called me and cancelled the scheduled interview. Too bad - he looked very promising. But my office-lady managed to arrange another meeting. The boy that came in looked like fresh from school. And indeed he graduated just half a year before. And he had a sweet, innocent face. According to his CV he worked a couple of months at a pizzeria and a car service since then. So basically an all-rounder. But the payment was always very bad so I was sure I could get his attention. Because 22 000 CZK per month for a job in the warehouse is a damn good offer. I was sure that he would get naked, but would he suck me? And the most essential question of all: would he let my bonder deep inside his innocent straight ass?
title: Dirty Scout 15
